SongLyrics.JpnStr: 健康的[けんこうてき]な朝[あさ]だな
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's a healthy morning

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こんな時[とき]に君[きみ]の”愛[あい]してる”が聞[き]きたいや
SongLyrics.EngStr: At a time like this, I want to hear you say 'I love you'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 揺[ゆ]れるカーテン
SongLyrics.EngStr: The curtains are swaying

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 少[すこ]し浮[う]いた前髪[まえがみ]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even the slightly lifted bangs

SongLyrics.JpnStr: すべて心地[ここち]いいさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Everything feels comfortable

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それに割[わ]れてしまった目玉焼[めだまや]き
SongLyrics.EngStr: And the fried egg that broke apart

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ついてないなあ
SongLyrics.EngStr: What bad luck

SongLyrics.JpnStr: バランスをとっても溢[あふ]れちゃうや
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even when I balance it, it still overflows

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 少[すこ]し辛[から]くて
SongLyrics.EngStr: A little spicy

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 少[すこ]し酸[す]っぱくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: A little sour

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 甘[あま]ったるかったりさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: And a bit too sweet

SongLyrics.JpnStr: とりあえず今日[きょう]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: For now, today

SongLyrics.JpnStr: バラの花[はな]に願[ねが]い込[こ]めてさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll put a wish in a rose

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 馬鹿[ばか]な夢[ゆめ]で踊[おど]ろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let's dance with a foolish dream

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]を伝[つた]えたいだとか
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to express my love, or something like that

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 臭[くさ]いことばっか考[かんが]えて待[ま]ってても
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I keep thinking of corny things while waiting

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だんだんソファに沈[しず]んでいくだけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I just gradually sink into the sofa

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]が明日[あした]良[いい]い男[おとこ]になるわけでもないからさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's not like I'll become a better man by tomorrow

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 焦[あせ]らずにいるよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: So I'll stay calm

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今日[きょう]は日[ひ]が落[お]ちる頃[ころ]に会[あ]えるの？
SongLyrics.EngStr: Will I see you around sunset today?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: “完璧[かんぺき]な男[おとこ]になんて惹[ひ]かれない”と
SongLyrics.EngStr: You said, 'I'm not attracted to perfect men'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が笑[わら]ってたから悔[くや]しいや
SongLyrics.EngStr: You laughed, and it frustrated me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 腐[くさ]るほどに話[はな]したいこと沢[たく]山[さん]あるのにな
SongLyrics.EngStr: I have so many things I want to talk to you about

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 寂[さび]しいさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's lonely

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 結局[けっきょく]のところ君[きみ]はさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the end, what about you?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どうしたいの？
SongLyrics.EngStr: What do you want?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まじで僕[ぼく]に愛[あい]される気[き]あんの？
SongLyrics.EngStr: Are you serious about being loved by me?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 雫[しずく]が落[お]ちてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: The droplets are falling

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 窓際[まどぎわ]目[め]の際[きわ]お気[き]に入[い]りの花[はな]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The flower by the window that I love

SongLyrics.JpnStr: とりあえず今日[きょう]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: For now, today

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 部屋[へや]の明[あ]かり早[はや]めに消[け]してさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let's turn off the lights in the room early

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どうでもいい夢[ゆめ]を見[み]よう
SongLyrics.EngStr: And dream of things that don't matter

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 明日[あした]は2人[ふたり]で過[す]ごしたいなんて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to spend tomorrow with you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 考[かんが]えていてもドアは開[あ]かないし
SongLyrics.EngStr: But even thinking about it won't open the door

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だんだんおセンチになるだけだ僕[ぼく]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: I just get more and more sentimental

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]が何[なん]だとか言[い]うわけでもないけど
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's not like I'm talking about what love is

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ただ切[せつ]ないと言[い]えばキリがないくらいなんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's just that there's no end to how sad it makes me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もう嫌[いや]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm tired of it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ろうそく炊[た]いて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if we light candles

SongLyrics.JpnStr: バカでかいケーキがあっても
SongLyrics.EngStr: And have a huge cake

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が食[く]いつくわけでもないだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: You probably wouldn't even take a bite

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 情[なさ]けないずるい事[こと]ばかりを
SongLyrics.EngStr: I keep thinking of pathetic, sneaky things

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 考[かんが]えてしまう今日[きょう]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's what I end up thinking about today

SongLyrics.JpnStr: バラの花[はな]もないよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't even have a rose

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 汚[よご]れてるシャツに履[は]き慣[な]れたジーパンで
SongLyrics.EngStr: In a dirty shirt and worn-out jeans

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]を伝[つた]えたいだとか
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to express my love, or something like that

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 臭[くさ]いことばっか考[かんが]えて待[ま]ってても
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I keep thinking of corny things while waiting

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だんだんソファに沈[しず]んでいくだけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I just gradually sink into the sofa

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]が明日良[あしたいい]男[おとこ]になるわけでもないからさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's not like I'll become a better man by tomorrow

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 焦[あせ]らずにいるよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: So I'll stay calm

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今日[きょう]は日[ひ]が落[お]ちる頃[ころ]に会[あ]えるの？
